overview: The Eyewitness Rock and Mineral DVD shatters the stone's reputation for "rock-solid" permanence. Discover how rocks keep a constantly changing record of our planet's fascinating history, and see how minerals are at the very core of our civilization.  DVD runs 35 minutes. Also includes a special "Making of Eyewitness" feature that runs 25 minutes.
tagline: Rock and Mineral, DK Eyewitness DVD
title: Eyewitness DVD:  Rock and Mineral
